Command.Name: InsertIGameObject
Command.Description: Inserts the IGameObject with global IGameObject ID GameObjectId at position X,Y.

Parameter.Description: The global IGameObject ID of the game IGameObject to insert.
Parameter.Name: ID

Parameter.Description: The initial X position of the IGameObject when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: X

Parameter.Description: The initial Y position of the IGameObject when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: Y

Command.Name: DeleteIGameObject
Command.Description: Deletes the IGameObject with global IGameObject ID id.

Parameter.Description: The global IGameObject ID of the IGameObject to delete.
Parameter.Name: ID
